commissions.title: Commission Requests
commissions.description: Interested in a custom piece? Send us an email with your ideas, preferred size, color palette, and timeline. We'll get back to you within 2-3 business days.

about.title: About Our Classes
about.description: EME Estudio offers yoga, pilates, and wellness classes designed to nurture body and mind. Our studio provides a welcoming space where movement meets creativity, combining physical practice with artistic inspiration.

offer.title: What We Offer
offer.smallGroup: Small group classes for personalized attention
